reviewText: It came in better than I hoped.
A series that is good and funny.
I have the whole first season and I can't wait to get the next volume each time! Great storyline and never gets boring! (:

There is subtle hints of yaoi throughout the series.  If you love a good monarchy, then this series is for you. There is tons of action and magic, but it also has a great story line.  Well worth adding to your collection!

This Was The Best Vol Of The Series If You Can Overlook Some Really Horrible Looking Backgrounds Then You Will Love This One I Don't Want To Spoil The Story But Conrad Is Still Alive Not That That Is Such A surprise But It's Still A Mystery There I'd Suggest Getting This Vol It's Really Good But Still Leaves Some questions Unanswered Can't wait For Vol 9

After witnessing the widespread destruction that the "End of the Earth" caused, Yuri decides to destroy Conrad's arm, which has turned into a key that opens the "End of the Earth." After learning that the world's best fighting event is actually fixed, Yuri and his group set off to participate, against Gunter's objections.

Power struggles emerge during the competition as Maxene takes Flynn as her hostage, and demands that Yuri forfeit. With the competition locked in a tie, Big Cimaron sends out a surprise player against Yuri in the championship game.
